description: AI Onboarding and peer programming assistant.

scripts.sync:scip-python: rsync -ax --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='.git/' ../scip-python/* ./packages/scip-python && cd ./packages/scip-python && npm install && cd packages/pyright-scip && npm run build && cd ../../..
